text:
Hello Community,
I have created a a HubSpot application and tried to bind custom action.
It is now visible choose and action. When I try to navigate to next page, I am getting an error on the widget.
Hi everyone! I was wondering if anyone has come across to a problem on iOS devices with the gap property using flexbox, on phones. I’ve tried several ways to fix it but is not working…

What iOS are you using?
Support isn’t the greatest for the gap property
<https://caniuse.com/?search=flex%20gap>
Have you already added custom recaptcha on HubSpot form ? ( how does it work for the back-end validation )

Hey! Any suggestions out there for hiding links? I have a scenario where certain pages are available only with a login. Those pages have links to many downloadable assets. But logged in users could technically just snag those asset URLs and have the ability to share them with whoever. I’d like to make it where they can still download, but they have no way of actually seeing the URL of the file. Thoughts?
thanks! However no matter where i click the section icons don´t come back until i refresh the page :disappointed:

Hello good morning! I'm having an issue. I have non HubSpot forms active in the platform, and is working well except for one form that is in a modal/popup. It's creating contacts with the original source everywhere but there. Does someone knows how to solve this issue? (without any third party software, as we need the original source of the contact). I'll attach a picture of the form
Are there any errors in the console?
After unchecking this in my cookie settings in chrome, it does seem to work: "Block third-party cookies and site data"

CTA Question Here: Is there a way to attach the cta data to a link other than embedding that actual CTA into the markup? We are looking at using web components and I would love for our editors to be able to create a CTA, or rather get a unique CTA ID and attach that to a href
I have been away from HubSpot for sometime, so just getting back into it

I am having a Blog post issue with inserting Anchors using the WYSIWYG, the dialog box just disappears after it appears right away, does anyone else have this issue? in thread is a screen capture of what is happening

Calling all HubL experts in NZ - DM me if you or anyone you know will be interested in this position!  <https://www.trademe.co.nz/a/jobs/it/web-design/canterbury/christchurch-city/part-time/listing/3241642239?bof=8VjFs2lp>
this url maybe be help full for You..
